examples: You've messed up royally this time!
That was a royally stupid thing to say.

body_content.explanation: very well, as if intended for or typical of a king or queen:
examples: We always get treated royally when we stay here.
As a young man earning a large salary, he lived royally for a good few years.

body_content.explanation: in a way connected to a king or queen, or a member of their family:
examples: The queen made a triumphant entrance to the town, escorted royally by the two princesses.
Responsibility for managing and protecting the property belongs to a royally appointed official.
